meanings.sent1: The fresh mountain spring provided us with untainted water for our hike.
meanings.sent2: The clear blue sky remained untainted by any clouds.
meanings.sent3: The untainted forest air filled our lungs with pure freshness.
meanings.sent4: Her untainted innocence shone through in every action she took.
meanings.sent5: The untainted snow glistened in the sunlight, untouched by footprints.

meanings.definition: Free from corruption or moral impurity
meanings.sent1: The young child's untainted heart saw the good in everyone.
meanings.sent2: The untainted reputation of the charity organization attracted many donors.
meanings.sent3: His untainted honesty sometimes got him into trouble, but he never wavered.
meanings.sent4: The untainted truth finally came to light, revealing the depths of the deception.
meanings.sent5: Her untainted soul radiated kindness and compassion to all who knew her.
